title: Custom Asset Compute Worker
description: This codelab is a tutorial about how to build custom Asset Compute Worker leveraging 3rd party service, which can be used by Adobe Experience Manager to generate intelligent renditions.

title: CI/CD in Firefly Apps
description: This codelab will guide you through setting up CI/CD for a Firefly App using GitHub Actions.

title: Debugging Firefly Apps
description: This codelab will guide you through the basic steps of debugging a Firefly App.

title: Customer Profiles Dashboard
description: This codelab will guide you through creating a dashboard of customer profiles from Adobe Campaign Standard using Project Firefly.

title: Firefly Headless App
description: This codelab will guide you through creating a Headless App using Project Firefly to render a barcode with dynamic data.

title: Spectrum Introduction
description: This codelab is an introduction to Spectrum to build a Firefly App UI.
